title: Lajos Puskás
text: Lajos Puskás (born 13 August 1944) is a <a href="Hungary">Hungarian</a> <a href="association%20football">football</a> <a href="Forward%20%28association%20football%29">forward</a> who played for <a href="Hungary%20national%20football%20team">Hungary</a> in the <a href="1966%20FIFA%20World%20Cup">1966 FIFA World Cup</a>. He also played for <a href="Vasas%20SC">Vasas SC</a>.
